trans-unit.source: The theme-config should be a set of key-value pairs. trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to easily automate the deployment of a Jekyll site.
trans-unit.target: 有很多方法可以轻松实现Jekyll站点的自动化部署。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to include digital assets in Jekyll. One common solution is to create a folder in the root of the project directory called something like assets, into which any images, files or other resources are placed. Then, from within any post, they can be linked to using the site’s root as the path for the asset to include. Again, this will depend on the way your site’s (sub)domain and path are configured, but here are some examples in Markdown of how you could do this using the absolute_url filter in a post.
trans-unit.target: 有多种方法可以将数字资产包含在Jekyll中。一种常见的解决方案是在项目目录的根目录中创建一个名为 assets 的文件夹，在其中放置任何图像，文件或其他资源。然后，可以在任何帖子中将它们链接到，以网站的根目录作为资产包含的路径。同样，这将取决于您网站的（子）域和路径的配置方式，但这是Markdown中的一些示例，这些示例说明了如何使用帖子中的 absolute_url 过滤器来进行此操作。

trans-unit.source: There are also a number of ways to easily automate the deployment of a Jekyll site. If you’ve got another method that isn’t listed below, we’d love it if you contributed so that everyone else can benefit too.
trans-unit.target: 还有许多方法可以轻松地自动完成Jekyll站点的部署。如果您有下面未列出的其他方法，如果您做出了贡献，那么我们将不胜感激，以便其他所有人也可以从中受益。

trans-unit.source: This site aims to be a comprehensive guide to Jekyll. We’ll cover topics such as getting your site up and running, creating and managing your content, customizing the way your site works and looks, deploying to various environments, and give you some advice on participating in the future development of Jekyll itself.
trans-unit.target: 该网站旨在成为Jekyll的综合指南。我们将介绍一些主题，例如使您的网站正常运行，创建和管理您的内容，自定义网站的工作方式和外观，部署到各种环境中，并为您参与Jekyll自身的未来发展提供一些建议。

trans-unit.source: This stage evaluates Liquid expressions in the current file. By default, the interpretation is shallow — in that any Liquid expression in resulting output is not further interpreted. Moreover, any Liquid expression in the file’s front matter is left untouched.
trans-unit.target: 此阶段评估当前文件中的Liquid表达式。默认情况下，解释是浅的-因为结果输出中的任何Liquid表达式都不会进一步解释。而且，文件前部内容中的任何Liquid表达式都保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This stage invokes the converter mapped to the current file’s extension and converts the input string. This is when Markdown gets converted into HTML and Sass / Scss into CSS or CoffeeScript into JavaScript, etc, etc. Since this stage is determined by the file’s extension, Markdown or Sass inside a .html file will remain untouched.
trans-unit.target: 此阶段调用映射到当前文件扩展名的转换器，并转换输入字符串。这是Markdown转换为HTML，Sass / Scss转换为CSS或CoffeeScript转换为JavaScript等的时候。由于此阶段由文件扩展名决定， .html 文件中的Markdown或Sass将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This step is recommended if you use these instructions to deploy your site. If you put the deploy script in the root folder of your project, Jekyll will copy it to the output folder. This behavior can be changed in _config.yml.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用这些说明来部署站点，则建议执行此步骤。如果将 deploy 脚本放在项目的根文件夹中，Jekyll会将其复制到输出文件夹中。可以在 _config.yml 中更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: This tells gem to place its gems within the user’s home folder, not in a system-wide location, and adds the local jekyll command to the user’s PATH ahead of any system-wide paths.

trans-unit.source: This will read in blog/index.html, send it each pagination page in Liquid as paginator and write the output to blog/page:num/, where :num is the pagination page number, starting with 2.
trans-unit.target: 这将在 blog/index.html 中读取，将在Liquid中的每个分页页面作为 paginator 发送给它，并将输出写入 blog/page:num/ ，其中 :num 是分页页码，从 2 开始。

trans-unit.source: This will read in blog/index.html, send it each pagination page in Liquid as paginator and write the output to blog/page:num/, where :num is the pagination page number, starting with 2. If a site has 12 posts and specifies paginate: 5, Jekyll will write blog/index.html with the first 5 posts, blog/page2/index.html with the next 5 posts and blog/page3/index.html with the last 2 posts into the destination directory.
trans-unit.target: 这将在 blog/index.html 中读取，将其在Liquid中的每个分页页面作为 paginator 发送给它，并将输出写入 blog/page:num/ ，其中 :num 是分页页码，从 2 开始。如果网站有12个帖子并指定 paginate: 5 ，Jekyll将用前5个帖子写 blog/index.html ,用后5个帖子写blog blog/page2/index.html 用后2个帖子 blog/page3/index.html 。发布到目标目录。

trans-unit.source: Try adding future: true to your _config.yml file. Are they showing up now? If they are, then you were ensnared by an issue with the way Ruby parses times. Each of your posts is being read in a different timezone than you might expect and, when compared to the computer’s current time, is “in the future.” The fix for this is to add a timezone offset to each post (and make sure you remove future: true from your _config.yml file). If you’re writing from California, for example, you would change this:
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 future: true 添加到 _config.yml 文件中。他们现在出现了吗？如果是这样，那么您会被Ruby解析时间的方式所困扰。与您的预期时间相比，您在每个帖子中所读取的时区均与您预期的时区不同。解决此问题的方法是为每个帖子添加时区偏移量（并确保您从 _config.yml 文件中删除 future: true ）。例如，如果您是从加利福尼亚写的，则可以更改以下内容：

trans-unit.source: Under the current implementation, incremental regeneration will only generate a document or page if either it, or one of its dependencies, is modified. Currently, the only types of dependencies tracked are includes (using the {% include %} tag) and layouts. This means that plain references to other documents (for example, the common case of iterating over site.posts in a post listings page) will not be detected as a dependency.
trans-unit.target: 在当前的实现中，仅当修改了文档或页面或其依赖项之一时，增量生成才会生成文档或页面。当前，跟踪的依赖项的唯一类型是包括（使用 {% include %} 标签）和布局。这意味着对其他文档的普通引用（例如，在帖子列表页面中遍历 site.posts 的常见情况）不会被检测为依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Unlike posts, drafts don’t have a date, since they haven’t been published yet. Rather than naming your draft something like 2013-07-01-my-draft-post.md, simply name the file what you’d like your post to eventually be titled, here my-draft-post.md.
trans-unit.target: 与帖子不同，草稿没有日期，因为它们尚未发布。与其命名您的草稿类似 2013-07-01-my-draft-post.md ，不如将文件最终命名为您想要的文件的名称，即 my-draft-post.md 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike posts, pages by default mimic the source directory structure exactly. (The only exception is if your page has a permalink declared its front matter — in that case, the structure honors the permalink setting instead of the source folder structure.)
trans-unit.target: 与帖子不同，页面默认情况下完全模仿源目录结构。（唯一的例外是，如果页面上有一个 permalink 声明为首要任务，在这种情况下，该结构将采用永久链接设置，而不是源文件夹结构。）

trans-unit.source: Unlike tags, categories for posts can also be defined by a post’s file path. Any directory above _post will be read-in as a category. For example, if a post is at path movies/horror/_posts/2019-05-21-bride-of-chucky.markdown, then movies and horror are automatically registered as categories for that post.
trans-unit.target: 与标签不同，帖子的类别也可以通过帖子的文件路径来定义。 _post 上方的任何目录都将作为类别读入。例如，如果帖子位于路径 movies/horror/_posts/2019-05-21-bride-of-chucky.markdown ，则 movies 和 horror 会自动注册为该帖子的类别。

trans-unit.source: Unlike user and organization Pages, Project Pages are kept in the same repository as the project they are for, except that the website content is stored in a specially named gh-pages branch or in a docs folder on the master branch. The content will be rendered using Jekyll, and the output will become available under a subpath of your user pages subdomain, such as username.github.io/project (unless a custom domain is specified).
trans-unit.target: 与用户页面和组织页面不同，项目页面与用于其的项目保存在相同的资源库中，只是网站内容存储在专门命名的 gh-pages 分支或 master 分支的 docs 文件夹中。内容将使用Jekyll呈现，并且输出将在用户页面子域的子路径下可用，例如 username.github.io/project （除非指定了自定义域）。

trans-unit.source: Using front matter is one way that you can specify configuration in the pages and posts for your site. Setting things like a default layout, or customizing the title, or specifying a more precise date/time for the post can all be added to your page or post front matter.
trans-unit.target: 使用前端问题是您可以在网站的页面和帖子中指定配置的一种方法。设置默认布局等内容，自定义标题或为帖子指定更精确的日期/时间都可以添加到您的页面或帖子的开头。

trans-unit.source: Using YAML Front Matter is one way that you can specify configuration in the pages and posts for your site. Setting things like a default layout, or customizing the title, or specifying a more precise date/time for the post can all be added to your page or post front matter.
trans-unit.target: 使用YAML Front Matter是您可以在网站页面和帖子中指定配置的一种方法。设置默认布局等内容，自定义标题或为帖子指定更精确的日期/时间都可以添加到您的页面或帖子的前面。

trans-unit.source: Using html-proofer? You’ll want this environment variable. Nokogiri, used to parse HTML files in your compiled site, comes bundled with libraries which it must compile each time it is installed. Luckily, you can dramatically decrease the install time of Nokogiri by setting the environment variable NOKOGIRI_USE_SYSTEM_LIBRARIES to true.
trans-unit.target: 使用 html-proofer 吗？您将需要此环境变量。Nokogiri用于解析已编译站点中的HTML文件，它随附了库，每次安装时都必须对其进行编译。幸运的是，通过将环境变量 NOKOGIRI_USE_SYSTEM_LIBRARIES 设置为 true ，可以大大减少Nokogiri的安装时间。

trans-unit.source: We provide by default Content-Type and Cache-Control response headers: one dynamic in order to specify the nature of the data being served, the other static in order to disable caching so that you don’t have to fight with Chrome’s aggressive caching when you are in development mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，我们提供 Content-Type 和 Cache-Control 响应标头：一个是动态的，用于指定要提供的数据的性质；另一个是静态的，以禁用缓存，这样您就不必在遇到Chrome的激进式缓存时遇到麻烦您处于开发模式。

trans-unit.source: We recommend not installing Ruby gems globally to avoid file permissions problems and using sudo.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议不要全局安装Ruby gem，以避免文件权限问题和使用 sudo 。

trans-unit.source: We recommend setting up Jekyll with a gem-based theme but if you want to start with a blank slate, use jekyll new myblog --blank
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用基于gem的主题设置Jekyll，但是如果您要以空白 jekyll new myblog --blank ，请使用jekyll new myblog --blank

trans-unit.source: We recommend using a gem for your plugin. This will help you manage dependencies, keep separation from your site source code and allow you to share functionality across multiple projects. For tips on creating a gem take a look at the Ruby gems guide or look through the source code of an existing plugin such as jekyll-feed.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议为您的插件使用一个gem。这将帮助您管理依赖关系，与网站源代码保持分离，并允许您在多个项目之间共享功能。有关创建gem的提示，请查看Ruby gems指南，或浏览jekyll-feed等现有插件的源代码。

trans-unit.source: We set a reference to a secret environment variable for the action to use. The JEKYLL_PAT is a Personal Access Token and is detailed in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 我们设置了对要使用的操作的秘密环境变量的引用。该 JEKYLL_PAT 是个人访问令牌，并在接下来的章节中详细说明。

trans-unit.source: We specify our selected action and version number using helaili/jekyll-action@2.0.0. This handles the build and deploy.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 helaili/jekyll-action@2.0.0 指定我们选择的操作和版本号。这将处理构建和部署。

trans-unit.source: We therefore recommend that you lock the Timezone library to version 1.2 and above by listing gem 'tzinfo', '~> 1.2' in your Gemfile.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我们建议您通过在 Gemfile 中列出gem'tzinfo gem 'tzinfo', '~> 1.2' ，将Timezone库锁定为1.2版及更高版本。

trans-unit.source: We’re only going to cover builds from the master branch in this page. Therefore, ensure that you are working on the master branch. When the Action builds your site, the contents of the destination directory will be automatically pushed to the gh-pages branch with a commit, ready to be used for serving.
trans-unit.target: 在此页面中，我们仅涉及 master 分支中的构建。因此，请确保您正在 master 分支上工作。如有必要，您可以基于默认分支来创建它。当Action建立您的网站时，目标目录的内容将通过提交自动推送到 gh-pages 分支，准备用于服务。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Jekyll’s step-by-step tutorial. The goal of this tutorial is to take you from having some front end web development experience to building your first Jekyll site from scratch — not relying on the default gem-based theme. Let’s get into it!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到Jekyll的分步教程。本教程的目标是使您从拥有一些前端Web开发经验，到从头开始构建第一个Jekyll网站-不必依赖默认的基于gem的主题。让我们开始吧！

trans-unit.source: Well, you might be thinking what’s the point in this? Jekyll just copied an HTML file from one place to another. Well patience young grasshopper, there’s still much to learn!
trans-unit.target: 好吧，您可能会想这有什么意义？Jekyll只是将HTML文件从一个地方复制到了另一个地方。耐心的年轻蚱hopper，还有很多东西要学！

trans-unit.source: Well-formatted site data should be placed here. The Jekyll engine will autoload all data files (using either the .yml, .yaml, .json or .csv formats and extensions) in this directory, and they will be accessible via `site.data`. If there's a file members.yml under the directory, then you can access contents of the file through site.data.members.
trans-unit.target: 格式正确的站点数据应放在此处。该化身引擎会自动加载的所有数据文件（使用的 .yml ， .yaml ， .json 或 .csv 格式和扩展）在此目录中，他们将通过`site.data`访问。如果目录下有一个 members.yml 文件，那么您可以通过 site.data.members 访问文件内容。

If there's a file members.yml under the directory, then you can access contents of the file through site.data.members.
trans-unit.target: 格式正确的站点数据应放在此处。该化身引擎会自动加载的所有数据文件（使用的 .yml ， .yaml ， .json ， .csv 或 .tsv 格式此目录中的格式和扩展），他们将通过`site.data`访问。如果目录下有一个 members.yml 文件，则可以通过 site.data.members 访问文件内容。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you make a push to the selected branch, the Jekyll action runs jekyll build in an isolated Jekyll Docker image. The output is generated to the /filesystem directory, and can be further deployed to FTP/SFTP and IaaS services. You can add your own commands, install additional packages, attach services, and run Selenium tests, as well as add other actions down the pipeline, eg. a Slack notification or an SSH script that will restart your server.

trans-unit.source: While incremental regeneration will work for the most common cases, it will not work correctly in every scenario. Please be extremely cautious when using the feature, and report any problems not listed below by opening an issue on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 虽然增量再生将在大多数情况下起作用，但并非在每种情况下都正确工作。使用该功能时请格外谨慎，并通过在GitHub上打开问题来报告未在下面列出的所有问题。

trans-unit.source: While the phases above are self-explanatory, the one phase that warrants dissection is the rendering phase.

trans-unit.source: While this example is done with categories, you can easily extend your lists to filter by tags or any other variable created with extensions.

trans-unit.source: While this feature is to enable easier adoption of a theme, the restrictions ensure that a theme-config cannot affect the build in a concerning manner. Any plugins required by the theme will have to be listed manually by the user or provided by the theme’s gemspec file.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此功能使主题的采用更加容易，但这些限制确保主题配置不会以相关方式影响构建。主题所需的任何插件都必须由用户手动列出，或由主题的 gemspec 文件提供。

trans-unit.source: While you can configure the directory name in which your layouts can reside by setting the layouts_dir key in your config file, the directory itself should be located at the root of your site's source directory.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以通过在配置文件中设置 layouts_dir 键来配置布局所在的目录名称，但目录本身应位于站点 source 目录的根目录下。

trans-unit.source: While you don’t have to use Gemfile and bundler, it is highly recommended as it ensures you’re running the same version of Jekyll and its plugins across different environments.
trans-unit.target: 虽然您不必使用 Gemfile 和 bundler ，但强烈建议您这样做，因为它可以确保您在不同环境中运行相同版本的Jekyll及其插件。

trans-unit.source: With both fenced code blocks and highlighter enabled, this will statically highlight the code; without any syntax highlighter, it will add a class="LANGUAGE" attribute to the <code> element, which can be used as a hint by various JavaScript code highlighting libraries.
trans-unit.target: 启用围栏代码块和突出显示器后，将静态突出显示代码。如果没有任何语法突出显示器，它将在 <code> 元素中添加 class="LANGUAGE" 属性，各种JavaScript代码突出显示库都可以将其用作提示。

trans-unit.source: With gem-based themes, some of the site’s directories (such as the assets, _layouts, _includes, and _sass directories) are stored in the theme’s gem, hidden from your immediate view. Yet all of the necessary directories will be read and processed during Jekyll’s build process.
trans-unit.target: 利用基于创业板主题，一些网站的目录（如的 assets ， _layouts ， _includes 和 _sass 目录）存储在主题的宝石，从你眼前隐藏起来。但是，在Jekyll的构建过程中将读取并处理所有必需的目录。

trans-unit.source: With many websites — especially blogs — it’s very common to break the main listing of posts up into smaller lists and display them over multiple pages. Jekyll offers a pagination plugin, so you can automatically generate the appropriate files and folders you need for paginated listings.
trans-unit.target: 在许多网站（尤其是博客）中，将帖子的主要列表分成较小的列表并在多个页面上显示是很常见的。Jekyll提供了一个分页插件，因此您可以自动生成分页列表所需的适当文件和文件夹。

trans-unit.source: You can add your own filters to the Liquid template system much like you can add tags above. Filters are simply modules that export their methods to liquid. trans-unit.source: You may receive an error when checking if Jekyll has been installed properly. Reboot your system and run jekyll -v again. If the error persists, please open a RubyInstaller issue.

trans-unit.source: You might be wondering how you can have a blog without a database. In true Jekyll style, blogging is powered by text files only.

trans-unit.source: You want to ensure the Travis builds for your site are being run only on the branch or branches which contain your site. One means of ensuring this isolation is including a branch whitelist in your Travis configuration file. By specifying the gh-pages branch, you will ensure the associated test script (discussed above) is only executed on site branches. If you use a pull request flow for proposing changes, you may wish to enforce a convention for your builds such that all branches containing edits are prefixed, exemplified above with the /pages-(.*)/ regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 您要确保仅在包含您的站点的一个或多个分支上运行针对站点的Travis构建。确保这种隔离的一种方法是在Travis配置文件中包括分支白名单。通过指定 gh-pages 分支，您将确保仅在站点分支上执行关联的测试脚本（如上所述）。如果您使用请求请求流程来提出更改，则可能希望对构建实施约定，以使所有包含编辑的分支都带有前缀，如上用 /pages-(.*)/ 正则表达式例示。

trans-unit.source: You won’t need to place your included content within the _includes directory. Instead, the inclusion is specifically relative to the file where the tag is being used. For example, if _posts/2014-09-03-my-file.markdown uses the include_relative tag, the included file must be within the _posts directory or one of its subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 您无需将包含的内容放在 _includes 目录中。相反，包含是专门针对使用标签的文件。例如，如果 _posts/2014-09-03-my-file.markdown 使用 include_relative 标记，则包含的文件必须位于 _posts 目录或其子目录之一内。

trans-unit.source: You’ll need to reference the stylesheet in your layout.
trans-unit.target: 您需要在布局中引用样式表。

trans-unit.source: You’ll notice this is almost identical to index.html except there’s no front matter and the content of the page is replaced with a content variable. content is a special variable which has the value of the rendered content of the page it’s called on.
trans-unit.target: 您会注意到，这与 index.html 几乎完全相同，只是没有前题，页面的内容已替换为 content 变量。 content 是一个特殊变量，它具有被调用页面的呈现内容的值。

trans-unit.source: Your dynamic content, so to speak. The naming convention of these files is important, and must follow the format: YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP. The permalinks can be customized for each post, but the date and markup language are determined solely by the file name.
trans-unit.target: 您的动态内容可以这么说。这些文件的命名约定很重要，并且必须遵循以下格式： YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP 。将固定链接可以自定义每个岗位，但日期和标记语言是通过文件名来决定。

trans-unit.source: Your environment values can be anything you want (not just development or production). Some elements you might want to hide in development environments include Disqus comment forms or Google Analytics. Conversely, you might want to expose an “Edit me in GitHub” button in a development environment but not include it in production environments.
trans-unit.target: 您的环境值可以是任何您想要的值（不仅仅是 development 或 production ）。您可能想在开发环境中隐藏的某些元素包括Disqus评论表单或Google Analytics（分析）。相反，您可能希望在开发环境中公开“在GitHub中编辑我”按钮，但不将其包含在生产环境中。

trans-unit.source: Your site is automatically generated by GitHub Pages when you push your source files. Note that GitHub Pages works equally well for regular HTML content, simply because Jekyll treats files without YAML front matter as static assets. So if you only need to push generated HTML, you’re good to go without any further setup.
trans-unit.target: 当您推送源文件时，您的站点将由GitHub Pages自动生成。请注意，GitHub Pages同样适用于常规HTML内容，仅因为Jekyll将没有YAML优先事项的文件视为静态资产。因此，如果您只需要推送生成的HTML，那么无需进行任何进一步的设置就可以了。

trans-unit.source: Your site is automatically generated by GitHub Pages when you push your source files.
